Skills.Special: May take control of a ball when it passes through an adjacent hex as long as no one has control of the ball.
May control more than one ball at a time. If something causes Ball Hog to lose control of one ball, he loses control of them all.
If you do not have the highest score, Comeback Kid gets +1 to all skills. If you have the lowest score, Comeback Kid gets +2 to all skills.
When the last player to take a turn during a round gets a +1 to his shooting.
At the begining of the round you may choose to discard your hand and draw no new cards. If you do, Grok gets +3 size, +1 to both pass and shoot and +1 speed.
When Hollywood does not have control of a ball he gets -2 to his speed.
May move through a space occupied by another player.
At the begining of each round, you may discard your hand and draw three new cards.
Michelle Jordyn has her skills set to 75% (rounded up) of the player with the highest skill currently in the game.
At the begining of each round roll a six sided die, Mr. Unreliableâ€™s skills are all equal to that die roll.
If you draft Robotinator, you may have no other players on your team.
After passing the ball to another player, if the next player shoots the ball they receive +2 to their shooting rating.
If your team controls the ball and The Refridgerator is the first player to take an action he gets +1 to his speed. May use an extra action each round to check.
